questions.question: What is the total super built-up area of Max House, Okhla?
questions.answer: According to the Max House brochure, the total Super Built Up Area of Max House is 1,05,425 sq. ft. (Source: max-house-brochure.pdf, page 2).

questions.question: How many tenant floors are there in Max House?
questions.answer: According to the Max House brochure, there are 8 tenant floors in Max House, as stated on page 2 of the brochure.

questions.question: What is the typical floor plate size at Max House?
questions.answer: According to the Max House brochure, the typical floor plate size at Max House is 13,000 sq. ft. (Source: max-house-brochure.pdf, page 2).

questions.question: What is the green rating of Max House?
questions.answer: According to the Max House brochure, Max House is designed to be LEED Gold certified, as stated on page 10. This indicates that Max House has achieved a LEED Gold rating, which is a validation of its efforts to minimize its ecological footprint and promote sustainability.

questions.question: Does Max House use double-glazed windows?
